item.title: {[Webinar] Automate Your NGINX Environment with the Ansible Collection for NGINX Controller}
item.description: View in Browser    Did you know that 28% of enterprises have adopted a weekly app release cycle and 27% are releasing app updates every day? Achieving this kind of speed while maintaining the quality your customers expect is possible only with automation. item.title: {[Kubernetes] AWS vs. GCP vs. Azure}
item.description: Kubernetes: AKS vs. EKS vs. GKEKubernetes already won the battle of container orchestration tools. Now AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud each have their own managed Kubernetes version. item.description: The deadline for the Atlassian Codegeist hackathon is in 11 days. Submissions are due July 13th before 5pm EDT. Don't worry, you still have time to build and win big.In as little as a few hours, you can build scalable apps using Atlassian's new cloud app development platform, Forge. Although Forge is still in beta, you can request access using the referral "Codegeist" and start building. There are prizes for Connect apps, Forge apps, and bonus prizes for Trello Power-Ups.
